General.Name: Chung Fu Tex-International Corp
General.Description: Chung Fu Tex-International Corporation engages in the development rental, and sale of warehousing, housing, and buildings business. It is also involved in the tobacco and alcohol retail business. The company was formerly known as Chung Fu Zhenye Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chung Fu Tex-International Corporation in July 2010. Chung Fu Tex-International Corporation was founded in 1960 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 666, Jingping Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
